name: MarketingFunnelMaster - Performance Monitoring Dashboard
description: Real-time monitoring of all viral content automation workflows with alerts and optimization triggers

parameters.query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) as unique_visitors,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN event = 'quiz_completed' THEN 1 END) as quiz_completions,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN event = 'payment_initiated' THEN 1 END) as payment_attempts,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN event = 'purchase_completed' THEN 1 END) as sales,
  SUM(CASE WHEN event = 'purchase_completed' THEN CAST(data->>'amount' AS DECIMAL) END) as revenue,
  AVG(CASE WHEN event = 'vsl_watch_time' THEN CAST(data->>'duration' AS INTEGER) END) as avg_vsl_time
FROM analytics 
WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('hour', created_at);

parameters.name: text
